    • Method Detail

      • compileClasses

        public void compileClasses(String folder,
                  String resultFileName,
                  String[] options)
                    throws ParserConfigurationException,
                           SAXException,
                           IOException
        Method to compile all classes in the given folder. The generated classes are placed in the folder target/jpa-classes/. After compilation the resulting XML file will be read.
        Parameters:
        folder - the folder that contains the JPA classes to process.
        resultFileName - the resulting file of the generator. Must match the option of the annotation processor.
        options - the options for the compiling (primary the options for the annotation processor).
        Throws:
        ParserConfigurationException - when the parser cannot be created.
        SAXException - when the parsing fails.
        IOException - when the IO fails.

      • checkVisitedNodes

        public void checkVisitedNodes()
        Traverses the complete DOM and checks that every node is retrieved with getNode(java.lang.String). The check is done with Assert.

      • getRootElement

        public Element getRootElement()
        Returns the root element of the document.
        Returns:
        the root element.

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(String path)
             throws XPathExpressionException
        Returns the node with the given XPath.
        Parameters:
        path - the XPath of the node to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the node denoted by the XPath.
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException - if the XPath expression is invalid.

      • getAttribute

        public Node getAttribute(String name,
                Node node)
        Returns the given attribute of the given element.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the attribute to get.
        node - the element to get the attribute from.
        Returns:
        the named attribute.
